home.title: Unecessary Theories
home.description: here are some theories, they're probably unecessary

meaning_god.title: Meaning of God
meaning_god.description: the existence of god is irrelevant, but the meaning isn't

scale_time.title: Scale of Time
scale_time.description: How some facts about time make all of sci-fi really silly

prison.title: The Prison
prison.description: You're in a prison you can't see because you're distracted by all the writing on the wall.

intelligence.title: Intelligence
intelligence.description: Are we smart when we can't define the things we make up?

vase.title: Vase of the World
vase.description: Caution to you, when you create in order to relieve, you know not what you make

online_dating.title: Online Dating
online_dating.description: Online dating is not a fun activity, so I wrote some poetry about it.

girl.title: Girl on Path
girl.description: I was lost in a world of my own thinking thoughts, then I came upon her, and she connected the dots.

contact.title: The Impossibility of Alien Contact
contact.description: The science fiction community has done our culture an immense disservice by making possible what is perfectly implausible

perspective.title: Perspective
perspective.description: For the stone and the mote, the grass is always greener...
